mapper.sql: ID, CONTENT, USER_NAME, GMT_CREATE, GMT_MODIFIED, MEMO
mapper.insert:
insert into log
ID,
CONTENT,
USER_NAME,
GMT_CREATE,
GMT_MODIFIED,
MEMO,
#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{memo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.update:
update log
CONTENT = #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
USER_NAME = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
GMT_CREATE = #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
GMT_MODIFIED = #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
MEMO = #{memo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update log set CONTENT = #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, USER_NAME = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, GMT_CREATE = #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, GMT_MODIFIED = #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, MEMO = #{memo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT log.ID, log.CONTENT, log.USER_NAME, log.GMT_CREATE, log.GMT_MODIFIED, log.MEMO FROM log
